1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

"1. Unplug Steam Deck from Charger
2. Press the bottom right button (3 dots)
3. Navigate to the battery/power settings
4. See the battery symbol that indicates the Deck is charging"

1. Go to '...'
